xmlquery.searchEmployeeCareerLike: Select * from smhris_employee_career where company like ?
xmlquery.employeeCareerDelete: Delete from smhris_employee_career where idCareer = ? and idEmployee = ?
xmlquery.employeeCareerEdit: Update smhris_employee_career set company=?, lastPosition=?, description=?, yearFrom=?, yearTo=?, imgPath=? where idCareer=? and idEmployee=?
